About the Game

LovexLove Mini-game with the lovely royal maid.

- Sexual handling royal maids for masters -

Interactive animated game made fully with LIVE2D

You can have the fun of making love with the lovely royal maid when you get home.

â—†Details


â—‡ All 60fps Live2d animation

â—†There are two types of H scenes


â—‡ Normal position
â—‡ Mammary intercourse

Clothes on and off (normal position only)
4 types of leg positions (only normal position scenes)
2 types of hand positions (normal position only)
3 types of hair styles

The hair style can be changed according to the owner's preference.

There are 7 types of expressions in the normal position scene.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

â—†Note


â—‡ The characters in this work are all over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
